context: Federal government agency, 5,000 employees, implementing secure inter-agency data sharing platform for improved citizen services

request.purpose: Deploy federated data sharing platform enabling secure, real-time data exchange between 12 federal agencies
request.justification: Reduce citizen service processing time by 60% and eliminate duplicate data collection across agencies

decision_process.outcome: Identified 200+ data sharing use cases with comprehensive security framework
Selected blockchain-based platform with zero-trust security model
85% reduction in processing time with 99.9% data security maintained
Approved for phased rollout across all 12 agencies over 24 months
